titleStmt.title: An apology in the behalf of the sequestred clergy; presented to the High Court of Parliament; / by R. Mossom, preacher of Gods Word at S. Pet. P. Wh. London.
titleStmt.author: Mossom, Robert, d. 1679.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for William Grantham, at the Black Bear in S. Paul's Church-yard near the little north-door,

notesStmt.note: A variant has no hyphen between 'Church' and 'yard' in the imprint.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: the Black Bear in S. Paul's Church-yard near the little north-door
